name: Tot Soccer
description: SFRPD Tot Soccer classes introduce the fundamentals of soccer. Through a variety of skill- development drills and games, the experienced coaches will help boost each child's confidence, physical fitness, and motor skills, while making some new friends. All classes will be held inside the gymnasium.

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
